leitej.util.stream

Class SniffOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • leitej.util.stream.SniffOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class SniffOutputStream
extends java.io.OutputStream
    An useful sniffer of output data stream.
    Author:
    Julio Leite

    • Constructor Detail

      • SniffOutputStream

        public SniffOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                         java.io.OutputStream out_sniffer)
        Creates a new instance of SniffOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - the underlying output stream to be sniffed, or null if this instance is to be created without an underlying stream
        out_sniffer - the underlying output stream to be assigned to the field this.out_sniffer for later use, or null if this instance is to be created without an underlying stream
